FuncDef:
The packet event monitor command displays the packet monitoring view.
The undo packet event monitor command deletes the packet monitoring view. The packet event monitor command displays the packet monitoring view. The undo packet event monitor command deletes the packet monitoring view. By default, the packet monitoring view is not displayed.
ExtraInfo: To analyze traffic passing through a device, you can run the packet event monitor command to enter the packet monitoring view and enable the packet loss visualization or latency visualization function.
